name: Angry Vampire Run Lite - Running Game
name_original: Angry Vampire Run Lite - Running Game
description:
Take to the streets with Angry Vampire Run!
Run, jump and slide over and around tons of different and WACKY obstacles in this crazy new Running game! Forget temples, jungles and subway stations - the ancient vampire city await you! Run to Infinity… and farther! Will you get out alive?
Download Now!
